title: The Blocky and Oxwinkle Show
description: Blocky and Oxwinkle face off against arch-enemies, Uri and Svetana, and obliviously save the day in the nick of time!
quote: Hey mister, you left your clock here in the middle of the street!
altHero: Blocky, a character with a cubed head, and Oxwinkle, a buffalo, are riding in an airplane
alt1: Uri and Svetana stand in the street next to a bomb
alt3: Oxwinkle looks sheepish, stuck in a tree with a tiny parachute
alt4: Blocky screams as Oxwinkle looks at him concerned
